game.name: Ephemeral Frame
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Step inside picture frames, films, and other imagery that connect a variety of dreamscapes in this surreal first-person exploration game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step inside picture frames, films, and other imagery that connect a variety of dreamscapes in this surreal first-person exploration game.
